title: Funnydruids
author: Funnydruids
created_time: October 17, 2022, 01:43:35 PMLast edit: October 17, 2022, 04:44:12 PM by Funnydruids
content: The PayPal account got closed and waiting for 160 days to be able to cash out the money.Its a EU account created in germany.I want to sell it for 100€.I will not be able to cash out the money and cant get it unbanned.Because I dont got any sepa or europe bank.If you got skills or know anything you can make 175€If you just gonna complain and be negative you dont need to type here, you are not forced to do anything, its just an offer.I give you e-mail + passport to and then you make 2FA. Telegram: @PokemonKungen

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Pretty bad deal to be honest, as if anyone takes you offer he will have to wait for 160 days to get their money (measly 165 euro profit) and there is always a possibility not to get the money even after that period, knowing how shitty PayPal is. Not to mention that there might not even be a PayPal account...And yeah, if you don't like negative comments don't leave offers on the forum.

comments.author: steve5946
comments.created_time: October 17, 2022, 09:17:49 PMLast edit: October 17, 2022, 09:48:25 PM by steve5946
comments.body: Hey, no need to panic. I have been through the same ordeal before. Here's a simple solution. You just need to wait for 160 days and then you can make an account on Payoneer or Wise and withdraw your funds easily to it. Also, anyone buying it will have a hard time before they can't withdraw the fund to an account that doesn't have your PayPal name on it after 160 days.I hope this helps you.

Not to mention that there might not even be a PayPal account...And yeah, if you don't like negative comments don't leave offers on the forum. Yeah, this forum is a bunch of people without friends and just sitting home alone and complain. THE WHOLE IDEA IS THAT HE NEED TO WAIT AND MAKE MONEY... jesus christ, why you say obvious things?

comments.author: Funnydruids
comments.body: Quote from: steve5946 on October 17, 2022, 09:17:49 PMHey, no need to panic. I have been through the same ordeal before. Here's a simple solution. You just need to wait for 160 days and then you can make an account on Payoneer or Wise and withdraw your funds easily to it. Also, anyone buying it will have a hard time before they can't withdraw the fund to an account that doesn't have your PayPal name on it after 160 days.I hope this helps you.Thanks dude.I will check it out!
